sentences.en: An amusing bit of copy would circulate until no one could be sure of its origin.
sentences.cn: 一则有趣的文字往往流传到谁都不知道它的出处.

sentences.en: As amusing bit of copy would circulate until no one could be sure of its origin.
sentences.cn: 一则有趣的文学往往流传到谁都不知道它的出处.

sentences.en: Blood must circulate properly in the head to supply the fresh oxygen the brain cells need.
sentences.cn: 血液必须在大脑中适当循环,为脑细胞提供所需要的新鲜氧气.

sentences.en: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.cn: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

sentences.en: Chemical constantly circulate or recycle in the system.
sentences.cn: 化学物质在系统中不断循环或回流.

sentences.en: Cooking odors can circulate throughout the entire house.
sentences.cn: 做饭的香味可以传到家里的各个角落。

sentences.en: Draughts help to circulate air.
sentences.cn: 穿堂风有助于空气流通。

sentences.en: He had concluded that Lyalin was a provocation , and simply refused to circulate the documents.
sentences.cn: 他断定利亚林是派过来的, 因而坚决拒绝传阅这些文件.

sentences.en: Here, you have a chance to circulate and chat informally.
sentences.cn: 在这儿, 你有机会四处走动,还可以随便聊天.

sentences.en: Keep one as a master copy for your own reference and circulate the others.
sentences.cn: 一盘留作母带自用，其余的都分发出去。

sentences.en: Let me get you something to drink, then I must circulate.
sentences.cn: 我给你找点喝的，然后我得去应酬一下。

sentences.en: Merchandise can now circulate freely among the EU countries.
sentences.cn: 商品现在可以在欧盟各国自由流通。

sentences.en: People who circulate false news are to be blamed.
sentences.cn: 散布流言者该受遣责.

sentences.en: Rumours began circulating that the Prime Minister was seriously ill.
sentences.cn: 谣言开始流传，说首相病情严重。

sentences.en: Rumours were already beginning to circulate that the project might have to be abandoned.
sentences.cn: 已传出谣言说，该项目可能会被迫取消。

sentences.en: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.cn: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.en: The blood must circulate freely everywhere in the body.
sentences.cn: 血液应该是全身畅通的.

sentences.en: The document was previously circulated in New York at the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 这份文件过去曾在纽约的联合国总部传阅过。

sentences.en: The group circulated petitions calling for a federal law to ban handguns.
sentences.cn: 该团体派发要求联邦法律禁用手枪的请愿书。

sentences.en: You will have a chance to circulate and chat informally.
sentences.cn: 你们会有机会四处走动一下,互相聊聊.

words.tran_cn: 循环性的；促进循环的；（货币、报刊等）具有流通性的

trans.tran_cn: 传递，传阅，流传，循环，传播，往来应酬
trans.tran_en: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
to move around within a system, or to make something do this
